text: “Soni tulembelani yambone pa duniya pano ni ku Akhera kwakwe, chisimu uwwe tuwujiile Kukwenu.” (Allah) jwatite: “Ilagasyo Yangu chinansausye nayo jwangunsaka (mwa wandu wakusakala), sano chanasa Changu ni chin'jeeneele chindu chilichose (pa duniya), nambo (ku Akhera) chinjalembela chalakwe (chanasacho) kuti chikaapate awala wali ni woga (wakun'jogopa Allah) ni akutolaga Zaka, kwisa soni awala waakuwa ali nkugakulupilila ma Aya Getu.”
